mapper.sql: select id, `name`, code, `type`, leavel, claz, author, mechanism, publication_date, version, circulation, ISBN, series, key_words, price, mark, other, is_del, status, create_personal, create_time, update_time, update_personal from library_book
mapper.insert:
insert into library_book
id, `name`, code, `type`, leavel, claz, author, mechanism, publication_date, version, circulation, ISBN, series, key_words, price, mark, other, status, create_personal, create_time, update_time, update_personal,
#{id}, #{name}, #{code}, #{type}, #{leavel}, #{claz}, #{author}, #{mechanism}, #{publicationDate}, #{version}, #{circulation}, #{isbn}, #{series}, #{keyWords}, #{price}, #{mark}, #{other}, #{status}, #{createPersonal}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{updatePersonal},
mapper.update: update library_book set is_del = '1',update_time = now() ,update_personal = #{operator} where id = #{id}
mapper.sql: FROM `library_book` AS lb LEFT JOIN `library_auth` AS la ON la.id = lb.author AND la.status='1' AND la.is_del='0' LEFT JOIN `base_book_class_cn` AS bbcc ON bbcc.id = lb.claz AND bbcc.status='1' LEFT JOIN `library_press` AS lp ON lp.id = lb.`mechanism` AND lp.status='1' AND lp.is_del='0' LEFT JOIN `book_stock` AS bs ON bs.book_id = lb.id AND bs.status='1' AND bs.is_del='0' LEFT JOIN `sys_dept` AS sd ON bs.`mechanism_id`=sd.dept_id AND sd.status='0' AND sd.del_flag='0' WHERE ( lb.name LIKE concat('%',#{param.keyWords},'%') OR lb.series LIKE concat('%',#{param.keyWords},'%') OR lb.key_words LIKE concat('%',#{param.keyWords},'%') OR lb.mark LIKE concat('%',#{param.keyWords},'%') OR la.name LIKE concat('%',#{param.keyWords},'%') OR la.country LIKE concat('%',#{param.keyWords},'%') OR la.nick_name LIKE concat('%',#{param.keyWords},'%') OR la.english_name LIKE concat('%',#{param.keyWords},'%') OR la.synopsis LIKE concat('%',#{param.keyWords},'%') OR la.identity LIKE concat('%',#{param.keyWords},'%') OR bbcc.name LIKE concat('%',#{param.keyWords},'%') OR bbcc.ali_name LIKE concat('%',#{param.keyWords},'%') OR lp.name LIKE concat('%',#{param.keyWords},'%') OR lp.addr LIKE concat('%',#{param.keyWords},'%') OR lp.mark LIKE concat('%',#{param.keyWords},'%') OR lp.email LIKE concat('%',#{param.keyWords},'%') OR sd.dept_name LIKE concat('%',#{param.keyWords},'%') ) AND lb.status = '1' AND lb.is_del='0'
mapper.select: SELECT lb.id as bookId, lb.`name` as bookName, lb.code as bookCode, lb.`type` as bookType, lb.leavel as bookLeavel, lb.claz as bookClaz, lb.author as bookAuthor, lb.mechanism as bookMechanism, lb.publication_date as bookPublicationData, lb.version as bookVersion, lb.circulation as bookCirculation, lb.ISBN as bookISBN, lb.series as bookSeries, lb.key_words as bookKeyWords, lb.price as bookPrice, lb.mark as bookMark, la.name as authName, la.country as authCountry, la.nick_name as authNickName, la.english_name as authEnglishName, la.synopsis as authSynopsis, la.identity as authIdentity, bbcc.code as clazCode, bbcc.name as clazName, lp.name as pressName, lp.addr as pressAddr, lp.mark as pressMark, lp.email as pressEmail, lp.phone as pressPhone, sd.dept_id as deptId, sd.dept_name as deptName, sd.leader as deptLeader, sd.phone as deptPhone, sd.email as deptEmail, (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM book_stock WHERE book_stock.is_del='0' AND book_stock.status='1' AND book_stock.book_id = lb.id) AS saveNumber, (SELECT COUNT(0) FROM book_stock WHERE book_stock.is_del='0' AND book_stock.status='1' AND has_loan='0' AND book_stock.book_id = lb.id) AS nowNumber
